verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6602>Pethuel.<s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> ye old <S%H2205>men,<s%> and give <S%H238>ear,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> Hath <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1961>been<s%> in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> or <S%H518>even<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers?<s%>

Tell <S%H5608><s%> ye your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> it, and let your <S%H1121>children<s%> tell their <S%H1121>children,<s%> and their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

That which the <S%H1501>palmerworm<s%> hath <S%H3499>left<s%> hath the <S%H697>locust<s%> <S%H398>eaten;<s%> and that which the <S%H697>locust<s%> hath <S%H3499>left<s%> hath the <S%H3218>cankerworm<s%> <S%H398>eaten;<s%> and that which the <S%H3218>cankerworm<s%> hath <S%H3499>left<s%> hath the <S%H2625>caterpillar<s%> <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

Awake, <S%H6974><s%> ye <S%H7910>drunkards,<s%> and <S%H1058>weep;<s%> and <S%H3213>howl,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye <S%H8354>drinkers<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> because <S%H5921>of<s%> the new <S%H6071>wine;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it is cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from your <S%H4480>mouth.<s%> <S%H6310><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H6099>strong,<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number,<s%> whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and he hath the cheek <S%H4973>teeth<s%> of a great <S%H3833>lion.<s%>

He hath <S%H7760>laid<s%> my <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H8047>waste,<s%> and <S%H7111>barked<s%> my fig <S%H8384>tree:<s%> he hath made it clean <S%H2834>bare,<s%> <S%H2834><s%> and cast it <S%H7993>away;<s%> the <S%H8299>branches<s%> thereof are made <S%H3835>white.<s%>
Lament <S%H421><s%> like a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H2296>girded<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H1167>husband<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

The meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> is cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H8334>ministers,<s%> <S%H56>mourn.<s%>

The <S%H7704>field<s%> is <S%H7703>wasted,<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H56>mourneth;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1715>corn<s%> is <S%H7703>wasted:<s%> the new <S%H8492>wine<s%> is dried <S%H3001>up,<s%> the <S%H3323>oil<s%> <S%H535>languisheth.<s%>

Be ye <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> O ye <S%H406>husbandmen;<s%> <S%H3213>howl,<s%> O ye <S%H3755>vinedressers,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H8184>barley;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> is <S%H6>perished.<s%>

The <S%H1612>vine<s%> is dried <S%H3001>up,<s%> and the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> <S%H535>languisheth;<s%> the pomegranate <S%H7416>tree,<s%> the palm <S%H8558>tree<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and the apple <S%H8598>tree,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> are <S%H3001>withered:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> is withered <S%H3001>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

Gird <S%H2296><s%> yourselves, and <S%H5594>lament,<s%> ye <S%H3548>priests:<s%> <S%H3213>howl,<s%> ye <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> lie all <S%H3885>night<s%> in <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> ye <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of my <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> is <S%H4513>withheld<s%> from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> ye a <S%H6685>fast,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> a solemn <S%H6116>assembly,<s%> <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

Alas <S%H162><s%> for the <S%H3117>day!<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand,<s%> and as a <S%H7701>destruction<s%> from the <S%H4480>Almighty<s%> <S%H7706><s%> shall it <S%H935>come.<s%>

Is <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H400>meat<s%> cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> our <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> yea, <S%H8057>joy<s%> and <S%H1524>gladness<s%> from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of our <S%H430>God?<s%>

The <S%H6507>seed<s%> is <S%H5685>rotten<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H4053>clods,<s%> the <S%H214>garners<s%> are laid <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> the <S%H4460>barns<s%> are broken <S%H2040>down;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1715>corn<s%> is <S%H3001>withered.<s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> do the <S%H929>beasts<s%> <S%H584>groan!<s%> the <S%H5739>herds<s%> of <S%H1241>cattle<s%> are <S%H943>perplexed,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4829>pasture;<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> are made <S%H816>desolate.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee will I <S%H7121>cry:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and the <S%H3852>flame<s%> hath <S%H3857>burned<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

The <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H6165>cry<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H650>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> are dried <S%H3001>up,<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
